home.description_text: A self-taught Full Stack Web Developer with over 3 years of experience in the industry. I craft robust and dynamic web solutions that seamlessly integrate user experience with business objectives, delivering high-impact digital products.
home.experience_1_description_list_1: Development of a parser to organize government public contracts.
home.experience_1_description_list_2: Creation of SQL databases and ER diagrams.
home.experience_1_description_list_3: Programming a parser in Java to read XML documents and store the information in the database.
